Show product image:
You can show your product thumb in the google product snippet

Show product review:
You can show your product review in the google product snippet

Show product SKU:
You can show your product SKU in the google product snippet

Show product price:
You can show your product price (with discount if any) in the google product snippet

Show product stock:
You can show your product availability in the google product snippet. This will be based on stock status of the product
After this extension is enabled and configured, you can test your product pages with Google testing tool

Description:
Select a description to use for structural data. Automatic mode will select blurb if available, otherwise, product description will be used
